rules_text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Swampcycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
Flashback {3}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
